jetpack-related-posts.title: Humanities (History and Geography)
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our humanities (History/Geography) leader is Mrs R Henstock. Please let her know if you have any questions or support needs!   To read our 'intent statement' for History, please read here: History Intent Statement   To read our 'intent statement' for Geography, please read here: Geography Intent Statement   HISTORY…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Physical Education (PE), Sport and Dance
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our PE, dance and sport team is led by Mrs N Exley. Please feel free to ask her for any advice or support required. Our PE link Governor is Mr Andrew Noble.   Some free PE resources during school closure (more on the main 'curriculum' start tab...) real PE at…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Music & Faith (RE)
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our faith and music leader is Mrs R Andrew- she is very happy to offer any advice or support where required!   To read our 'intent statement' for Music please read: Music Intent Statement   To read our 'intent statement' for Faith please read: Faith Intent Statement   MUSIC CURRICULUM…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Computing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: To read our ‘intent statement’ for Computing, please see here: Computing Intent Statement   For curriculum coverage, please read here: Computing Curriculum Coverage   For more information please contact our Computing/ICT lead...Mr T Venus!   At Springvale Primary School, we aim to integrate Computing throughout the wider curriculum as well…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Phonics and Reading
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our Reading leaders are Mrs R Fearn and Mrs D Royston. Please ask them for more information or support where needed. At Springvale we foster a love of reading from an early age. To read our ‘intent statement’ for early Literacy and phonics, please see here: Early Literacy and Phonics…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Nursery
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our Nursery (F1) Class Page! We are the Rainbow Rangers! Our teacher is Mrs N Exley Our class is supported by Mrs L Armitage and Mr I France Every day the children have lots of fun inside and outside, learning how to play and share, talk, listen and…
